topSection.title: Compute Labs
topSection.heading: Financialize AI by enabling direct exposure to compute assets, yield, & derivatives
topSection.subheading: Welcome to Compute Labs: Your Gateway to AI Investments

section2.heading: Compute Tokenization Protocol
section2.subheading: Compute Tokenization Protocol (CTP) is built to tokenize enterprise grade GPUs. CTP is the foundation to pricing compute assets and enabling trading, staking, and derivatives for this emerging asset class.

section3.heading: GPU Custody
section3.subheading: Acquire & custody H100s & B200s in T3 data centers and tokenize them into GNFTs – the compute will be further "restaked" into (de)centralized compute networks and DePIN projects for yield

section4.heading: Compute Derivatives
section4.subheading: Expand AI-Fi ecosystem  by introducing derivatives such as GPU ETF, Compute Index, perp, staking & lending, etc, removing the barrier and enabling everyone to participate in AI prosperity
